about_the_game:
Synopsis:

Bureau 749 is a private and secret department in China responsible for the investigation and disposal of unnatural phenomena, supernatural powers, and paranormal events. Involved in many mysterious events since the founding of the Republic. Such as Peng Jiamu missing case, Kunlun Mountain mantis incident, Sichuan Daba Mountain green Maoist incident, Qinling Mountains Sino-Japanese fighting incident and so on. This game is based on the rumor revealed by the relevant personnel that actually happened in Wuxi alien events.

As a young agent of the 749 Bureau, Jia Hua is ordered to go to an abandoned factory in the outskirts of Wuxi to investigate the truth of the alien incident rumored on the Internet. I thought this was just an urban legend, but things are far from simple.

Game Features:

Exciting shooting experience: carefully designed battle scenes, let you feel the pleasure of fighting.

Immersive story: Explore with Jia Hua the truth about mysterious creatures and the love and hate hidden inside the 749 Bureau through cinematic animation.

Mystery and suspense: Gradually uncover the truth behind the abandoned factory, feel the tension and excitement of the unknown world.

Orbital Shooting: Experience an immersive adventure through traditional arcade-style gameplay with orbital shooting from a first-person perspective.

Description:

The story of this game is pure fiction, does not really map any events in reality, if the same, pure coincidence!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains a lot of blood and dismemberment for killing enemies and a little nudity

Synopsis:

Bureau 749 is a private and secret department in China responsible for the investigation and disposal of unnatural phenomena, supernatural powers, and paranormal events. Involved in many mysterious events since the founding of the Republic. Such as Peng Jiamu missing case, Kunlun Mountain mantis incident, Sichuan Daba Mountain green Maoist incident, Qinling Mountains Sino-Japanese fighting incident and so on. This game is based on the rumor revealed by the relevant personnel that actually happened in Wuxi alien events.

As a young agent of the 749 Bureau, Jia Hua is ordered to go to an abandoned factory in the outskirts of Wuxi to investigate the truth of the alien incident rumored on the Internet. I thought this was just an urban legend, but things are far from simple.

Game Features:

Immersive story: Explore with Jia Hua the truth about mysterious creatures and the love and hate hidden inside the 749 Bureau through cinematic animation.

Mystery and suspense: Gradually uncover the truth behind the abandoned factory, feel the tension and excitement of the unknown world.

Orbital Shooting: Experience an immersive adventure through traditional arcade-style gameplay with orbital shooting from a first-person perspective.

The story of this game is pure fiction, does not really map any events in reality, if the same, pure coincidence!
name: 749档案集：无锡外星人事件
publishers: 阿基米德 尼古拉斯 夏
short_description: Play as Jia Hua, an agent of Bureau 749, in this first-person rail shooter. Investigate alien rumors in a deserted factory, face intense combat, and uncover the hidden secrets of Bureau 749.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
